Thank you, up to 7 now keep em coming. we don't get these in NZ.  

UP THE IRONS \m/

Thanks for this. Heard about the show via Ray Maxwell's podshow on the TWiT network. Ray's a kooky renaissance sorta guy living just south of Vancouver, BC. He mentioned Ice Pilots NWT in episode #59 on a recent midair collision in Colorado. If TPB permits it, here's a link to his show's feed:

http://feeds.feedburner.com/odtv-maxwells-house/?format=xml
